message: Let's make a deal, Bob. 70 for me, 30 for you.  It's in your best interest to accept quickly before inflation eats away at your share.
Alice, your offer was a bit one-sided. Let's be fairer and split it 60/40. Time is money, you know!
Bob, let's be realistic. This money is losing value fast, especially for you. My last offer is still on the table -  65/35. After this round, it won't be worth nearly as much.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a hit from inflation here.  55/45 is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
